title: Lovely Huge 2 Story/3Bd House in East Kens w/FrontYard+Porch+RearYard
description:
Here's something really special!

A huge 2-story house, larger than many 3 story homes, 1,700ft, with 3 Bedrooms plus an extra studio on the 2nd Floor, 2 large living areas downstairs, large separate dining room, a great sized backyard and a front yard, a porch,  a big bright kitchen with tons of light, and central air! This house has large windows on 3 sides, gorgeous wood floors and nice details everywhere..
FRONT: New shiplap siding, remodeled porch, a new lawn, and historic elements come together to make a lovely and inviting space to relax.

1ST FLOOR: Enter into first living room with historic mantle and oak floors. Floor plan is open into a second living area with closet, custom built-in storage, more windows and great light. Middle of the house offers a great dining area and lovely stairway landing.

KITCHEN is in the rear with new tile, oak shelves, farmhouse sink, new stove and huge windows.

REAR YARD: Kitchen exits to rear year area - great size for gardening and entertaining.
2ND FLOOR: To the rear, a  great sized bright bedroom with increasingly hard-to-find historic pine flooring.  There is separate studio / extra living space on 2nd Floor - an amazing plus for artists or designers. Full bathroom is off the hallway with new sink/vanity, wallpaper, and classic tile. Hallway bedroom on 2nd floor has exposed brick and a built-in custom bed providing for huge storage underneath.  2nd Floor front bedroom (3rd bedroom) is large, with historic oak flooring, large windows and great light.
Basement is large, has a full laundry set-up (appliances included) and plenty of room for storage, workshop or music.

Owner installed HVAC/Central Air, and all windows were replaced.
This is a very large, very special house in a caring community.
Rent: $2250/mo. Tenant pays utilities. Pets are permitted on a case-by-case basis.

---Thanks---

title: Tell us what you think! Rentals in Philadelphia. 3 Beds, 2 Baths
description:
Welcome home!! Located just minutes from Center City, this beautiful 3 bedroom, 2 full bathroom home is ready for you to move right in! Greeted immediately with beautiful hardwood floors right when you walk in the front door, you'll notice the spacious and open floorplan on the main floor. The living room transitions nicely right into the dining area and updated kitchen. The kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, granite countertop, and plenty of counter and cabinet space with the kitchen island. Right through the kitchen you'll find the door to the spacious, finished basement which is also where the laundry is located. Also off the kitchen is the door to the backyard patio area that's full fenced in and has space for some outdoor seating and grill if desired. On the 2nd floor you'll find 2 spacious bedrooms, both with nice sized closets and also a fully updated full bathroom located between the two bedrooms. The 3rd floor consists of the spacious master suite with a large, walk-in closet and updated full bathroom with standing shower. Right next to the master suite you'll find the door to the 3rd floor deck which has BEAUTIFUL views of the iconic Philadelphia Skyline. Schedule your showings today!! title: Smoke-free apartments available, New fitness center
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

Stunning newly renovated apartment in the up-and-coming Loft District. Unit includes hardwood floors, washer/dryer, and 14' ceiling heights! Kitchens feature Italian-style charcoal textured wood grain cabinetry, solid quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, a commercial-style goose-neck faucet, and a built-in dishwasher. The bathroom features a thermostatic shower system with rain head, hand spray, and 4 sets of body jets; extra large soaking tubs; floating vanities with quartz countertops, a dual flush system for water savings, and high-end LED light strips in the shower cove and underneath the vanity. The building features a 24-hour concierge, a fully-equipped fitness center with a panorama of the skyline, a rooftop pool, and a hot tub. You won't want to miss this! Book your appointment today! title: Spectacular Old City 1-Bedroom, 1 Bathroom, Condo in the Metro Club
description: Spectacular Old City 1-Bedroom, 1 Bathroom, Condo in the Metro Club Condominiums on the 4th Floor with a deeded parking space! Parking in the city is becoming harder and harder and this is definitely a luxury. The Sunny and spacious layout boasts tons of natural sun light, beautiful brand new hardwood floors and glorious high 9' ceilings throughout with large windows and newly installed cellular shades, also known as honeycomb shades. Helps save money on energy costs by keeping the cool air or the heat warm. The kitchen includes granite counter tops and all stainless appliances, recessed lighting, and newly painted walls with artist red accents throughout. Stunning views that wrap around the entire unit facing Center City Philadelphia. The large bathroom features White Carrera Marble. Wonderful bedroom right off the living room boosts a custom closet system for extra storage. Monthly fee includes 24 hour doorman/concierge, a heated outdoor pool, 24 hour bright fitness room, hot tub and cabanas. Central location near Center City / Old City and Northern Liberties world-class restaurants and shops and very easy access to 76, 676, I-95 and the Ben Franklin Bridge. Walk score 97! Newer water heater and the HVAC system was just replaced in June of 2017!

title: GREAT RENTAL OPPORTUNITY LOCATED IN THE FAIRMOUNT NEIGHBORHOOD!
description:
Great rental opportunity. Located in the Fairmount neighborhood of Philadelphia. Many also call it the Art Museum area. This stylish 3 bedroom 2 bath home will surprise you with all the updates, upgrades and sophistication in a home that also offers rare 2 car parking. Parking includes 1 garage spot and 1 driveway spot. Enter through the light filled foyer and into the spacious kitchen and dining room. The living room features a wall of windows with a wood burning fireplace. The living space opens into an oasis for entertaining with the brick paved rear garden/yard. While allowing for privacy is also makes 3 season a entertaining a reality. The 2nd level features 2 very spacious bedrooms with ample closets, and modern renovated hall bath and laundry area. The layout allows for each room occupants personal privacy. The 3rd floor master suite features an oversized bedroom space with it's own balcony/deck. Great view of the holiday fireworks on the parkway. In addition you will find a full walk-in closet that could also offer additional closet space and renovated owners bath. The NEW design in this home has all your bathing and personal needs in 1 beautifully designed space with upgraded flooring, vanity and glass enclosed tiled shower. Other upgrades include the kitchen, the entry way flooring, and refinished hardwood floor throughout, superior appliances including an almost silent disposal, and washer dryer with extra storage stands and washer with 2nd separate washer drawer for small items. The lower level offers significant storage, utilities and access to the garage from inside the home. Some owners have converted the garage into additional living space. The home offers a electric car (EV) charging station in the garage. Located conveniently near both University of Penn and Drexel University, numerous shopping and world class restaurants, 30th Street Station, and world famous Fairmount Park.

title: Wonderful opportunity to live in the historic landmark Colannade Build
description:
Wonderful opportunity to live in the historic landmark Colannade Building! Built in 1932 as a The Wills Eyes Institute, today is has blossomed into a beautiful condo conversion with modern amenities including a doorman, secured entrance, and a gorgeous atrium that is currently under renovation with a world class designer. This is moderate sized boutique building is home to 115 units. Unit 409 is newly renovated with state of the art finishes. Stainless steel appliances, gorgeous warm chestnut cabinets with built in diamond wine rack and glass bar. onyx granite counters with flecks of gold. Venetian stone backsplash with gilded rope details with an elaborate crystal chandelier over kitchen island. Blonde kitchen floor tiles. Maple hardwood floors in living area and bedroom with nice size closets and windows for plenty of natural light. Custom designer paint throughout. Enter into the master bath with Venetian stone tile with sea glass accents and custom vanity mirror with Frigidaire stackable washer dryer. Building is equipped with a fitness room and storage area in basement. Walking distance to essentially everything Philly has to offer. Subway, bus lines, 76, 95, Center City, Kelly Drive area cafes, music venues, restaurants, fitness centers, boot camps and crossfit. You want it, we got it! This lovely home can come partially furnished with two comfortable leather couches, small dining table and fully stocked kitchen (utensils, pots/pans, etc.) for 50 more a month.

title: Renovated 1 Bedroom Apartment Home, Dog Spa, Lounge, Near Restaurants
description:
The home at 915 is available for lease at this moment! This 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 9th floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, Maxx's Produce, Spruce Food Market, Trader Joe's, and Giant. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, J. Crew, Tiffany & Co., Brooklinen, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, and Vans. Have a French feast at Parc. Grab a delicious coffee and a scone at Nook Bakery & Coffee Bar. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury. Stroll across the park and then grab a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. Relax in the park at Rittenhouse Square. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry room on the 3rd floor
* Dog spa at the pet-friendly community
* 8,000-square-foot resident lounge with free wifi

* Guest suites for the family & friends of current residents

* Fitness studio

* 24/7 emergency maintenance

* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square

* Renovated kitchen & bathroom
* Disposal

* Microwave
* Dishwasher
* Neutral carpet
* Large mainly south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* 9th floor home has one west-facing window in the living and dining room area with a park view

title: New fitness center, Elevator building, Beautiful courtyards
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: STUNNING, COMPLETELY RENOVATED 2 BEDROOM, 2 BATHROOM RESIDENCE!
description:
Stunning, completely renovated two bedroom, two bathroom residence located on the 19th floor of The Academy House along the Avenue of the Arts! Enter into the foyer with black tile floors and coat closet. The large eat-in kitchen has granite countertops, a peninsula, breakfast nook, modern wood cabinets, subway tile back splash and stainless steel appliances including a Frigidaire electric range, oven and microwave, a Kitchenaid refrigerator, and a Whirlpool dishwasher. The adjacent great room has hardwood floors and city views to the south and east from a private Juliet balcony which can be accessed from each room. The primary suite has great closet space and a spacious ensuite bathroom which features a shower/tub with subway tile and a double vanity. The second bedroom is spacious and also has a large amount of closet space. Directly across is the hall bathroom which has tile flooring, a contemporary glass vanity, and a shower/tub. There is a Maytag stackable washer/dryer in the unit. No detail was left undone in this showplace condominium. The terrace doors were pushed out to increase interior square footage. Residents of Academy House enjoy a 24-hour doorman and a state-of-the-art fitness and aquatic center. There is valet parking in the building's garage for an additional monthly fee, subject to availability. The Academy House is located in the heart of Center City and within close walking distance to Rittenhouse Square, Washington Square, and the Broad Street and Market Street office corridors. The Philadelphia International Airport and Amtrak's 30th Street Station are easily accessible.
1420 Locust St #19F

title: WELCOME TO BRIDGEVIEW! LOCATED IN BUSTLING OLD CITY!
description:
SHORT-TERM 6-MONTH LEASE. Welcome to Bridgeview! Located in bustling Old City, on a quiet cobblestone street, is a renovated, top-floor loft for you to call home. The building features high-quality amenities including a roof deck, garage parking, 24-hour concierge service, and a thriving association of owners. Your new home, unit 616, is bathed in natural light and features the high ceilings and exposed brick walls of your dreams. Enter the unit and find ample storage by the door before moving toward the kitchen, notice the hardwood floors throughout. You’ll first find an updated kitchen with a fresh new backsplash, stainless steel appliances, and tons of storage. From here, you’ll enter the open living space with plenty of room for a dining table and living room set. Notice the size of these windows! You’ll find more closet storage on the way to the full bath that features stone tile and radiant heating in the floors. Next, is the large primary bedroom with two huge windows and more exposed brick. Another closet here for additional storage. Lastly, you’ll find a BONUS room that is perfect for a nursery, home office, gym, dressing room, yoga room, guest bedroom, or whatever you desire to make of it! Unit 616 comes with a 3x6 storage unit on the 6th floor (near the elevator and unit). GARAGE PARKING IS AVAILABLE FOR AN ADDITIONAL $250/ MO. Easy access to the Market Frankford Line, I-95 and the Ben Franklin Bridge make this a commuter's dream and on the evenings and weekends, you are in the heart of everything that Old City has to offer including tons of boutiques, coffee shops, restaurants, and museums. Don’t miss your opportunity to claim this stylish home for yourself!
315 New St #616

title: WELCOME TO UNIT 15A IN THE FABULOUS ELLINGTON BUILDING!
description:
Welcome to Unit 15A in the fabulous Ellington building! Unit 15A is a light-filled, south facing corner unit in one of the more spacious layouts of the building. High up on the 15th floor, you have views of South Philadelphia as well as the iconic Comcast building! High ceilings and oversized windows make for a comfortable living & dining space. The kitchen has plenty of cabinet and counter space plus stainless steel appliances. Storage is not an issue in this unit - the hall is lined with deep closets for all of your belongings and both bedrooms have ample closet space. The primary bedroom is complete with an en-suite bathroom. Stackable washer/dryer is located right off the kitchen. The Ellington is a secure, convenient building with a 24-hour concierge, fitness center, meeting & party rooms, and a library. Several parking garages with monthly options are within a block of the front door. No pets. First, last, and security deposit due prior to move-in. $300 non-refundable move-in fee required by the building. All utilities included except cable/internet.
1500 Chestnut St #15A

title: Become a Homeowner with Low to No Money Down
description: Are you looking to buy a home for your family but you don't have enough funds for a down payment just yet? Don't worry, this is the perfect opportunity for you to help you bridge the gap and achieve homeownership. With our rent to own program you will begin renting the property and we would apply your monthly rental payments toward the down payment so when the time comes to buy the property you will need to put down very little money out of pocket.
